title: Rune Wizard
summaries: The Rune Wizard is a rare Hardmode caster-type enemy that is found in the lower Cavern layer. Upon spawning, he will proceed to fire magical Rune Blast projectiles at the player that penetrate terrain, similar to the Fire Imp's Burning Spheres. However, unlike Burning Spheres, the Rune Wizard's projectiles cannot be destroyed in any way. He will teleport to a new location after firing six projectiles, and will always drop the Rune Hat and Rune Robe upon death.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer or its upgrades.
